Plot 3D PCs

Source: R/plot_3dpcs.R
plot_3dpcs.Rd

plot_3dpcs(input, ref, which_pcs = 1, vis_sd = 3, alpha = 1.2)

Arguments

input

Object of class prcomp, gm.prcomp or PC_list (see make_pcs)
ref

Reference face (sample average is recommended)
which_pcs

Which PCs are to be created. Single number or vector, maximum allowed is 3
vis_sd

Extent of desired manipulation in units of standard deviation
alpha

See ashape3d

Value

Returns plot

Examples


if (FALSE) {
path_to_ply <- system.file("extdata", "ply", package="facefuns")
data <- read_vertices(path_to_ply)
shapedata <- facefuns3d(data = data,
pc_criterion = "broken_stick")

plot_3dpcs(input = shapedata$pc_plot, which_pcs = 1, ref = shapedata$average, alpha = 2)

}
